title: Command '['C:\\Users\\Eddie\\Downloads\\Video Enhancement Software\\video2x v4.8.1\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\ffmpeg\\bin\\ffmpeg', '-hwaccel', 'auto', '-y', '-i', 'E:\\Video Capture\\OBS Capture\\Nick&Buddy_USA.mp4', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', 'C:\\Users\\Eddie\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmpbr8vhgq1\\extracted_%0d.png']' returned non-zero exit status 1.
body:
## Component Versions

Please at least fill in the release version and GUI or CLI version.

- **Video2X release version**: VERSION 4.8.1-WIN32-FULL
- **Upscaler version**: ?
- **GUI version**: ?
- **CLI version**: ?

## Symptom:
I GET THIS ERROR MESSAGE WHEN ATTEMPTING TO RUN VIDEO2X:
_**Command '['C:\\Users\\Eddie\\Downloads\\Video Enhancement Software\\video2x v4.8.1\\video2x-4.8.1-win32-full\\dependencies\\ffmpeg\\bin\\ffmpeg', '-hwaccel', 'auto', '-y', '-i', 'E:\\Video Capture\\OBS Capture\\Nick&Buddy_USA.mp4', '-pix_fmt', 'rgb24', 'C:\\Users\\Eddie\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\video2x\\tmp2gphvghi\\extracted_%0d.png']' returned non-zero exit status 1.**
PLEASE BE AWARE THAT I AM AN ABSOLUTE NOVICE AT THIS.  HOPEFULLY YOU CAN GET ME BACK ON THE RIGHT TRACK.


In this section, briefly describe what's going on.

## Error Log or Screenshots

Please upload or paste the error log here. You may also include screenshots.
**It is highly recommended to include your error log.**
